multiple.description: Whether to select more than one

value-key.description: As a key name that is uniquely identified by value, it is required if the binding value is an object type
value-key.description_zh: 作为 value 唯一标识的键名，绑定值为对象类型时必填

size.description: Enter the size of the field

clearable.description: Whether the option can be cleared

collapse-tags.description: When multiple selections are made, whether the selected values are displayed in the form of text
collapse-tags.description_zh: 多选时是否将选中值按文字的形式展示

:multiple-limit.description: When multi-selecting, the maximum number of items that a user can select is not limited if it is 0
:multiple-limit.description_zh: 多选时用户最多可以选择的项目数，为 0 则不限制

name.description_zh: select input 的 name 属性

autocomplete.description_zh: select input 的 autocomplete 属性

auto-complete.description: The next major version is deprecated

allow-create.description: Whether or not to allow users to create new entries needs to be used with 'filterable'
allow-create.description_zh: 是否允许用户创建新条目，需配合 `filterable` 使用

remote.description: Whether it is a remote search

loading.description: Whether data is being obtained from a remote location
loading.description_zh: 是否正在从远程获取数据

loading-text.description: The text that is displayed when loaded remotely
loading-text.description_zh: 远程加载时显示的文字

no-match-text.description: If the search conditions do not match, you can also use the 'slot="empty"' setting
no-match-text.description_zh: 搜索条件无匹配时显示的文字，也可以使用`slot="empty"`设置

no-data-text.description: The text that is displayed when the option is empty, you can also use the 'slot="empty" setting
no-data-text.description_zh: 选项为空时显示的文字，也可以使用`slot="empty"`设置

reserve-keyword.description: If you have multiple selections and are searchable, whether to keep the current search terms after selecting an option
reserve-keyword.description_zh: 多选且可搜索时，是否在选中一个选项后保留当前的搜索关键词

default-first-option.description: Press Enter in the input box and select the first match. Requires use with 'filterable' or 'remote'
default-first-option.description_zh: 在输入框按下回车，选择第一个匹配项。需配合 `filterable` 或 `remote` 使用

popper-append-to-body.description: Whether to insert a popover into the body element. If there is a problem with the positioning of the popover, you can set the property to false
popper-append-to-body.description_zh: 是否将弹出框插入至 body 元素。在弹出框的定位出现问题时，可将该属性设置为 false

automatic-dropdown.description: For non-searchable Select, whether the options menu will automatically pop up after the input box gains focus
automatic-dropdown.description_zh: 对于不可搜索的 Select，是否在输入框获得焦点后自动弹出选项菜单

methods.name: blur
methods.description: Makes input lose focus and hides the drop-down box
methods.description_zh: 使 input 失去焦点，并隐藏下拉框

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the selected value changes
events.description_zh: 选中值发生变化时触发

events.name: visible-change
events.description: Triggered when the drop-down box appears/hides
events.params: 出现则为 true，隐藏则为 false
events.description_zh: 下拉框出现/隐藏时触发

events.name: remove-tag
events.description: Triggered when a tag is removed in multi-select mode
events.description_zh: 多选模式下移除tag时触发

events.name: clear
events.description: Clearable radio mode is triggered when the user clicks the clear button
events.description_zh: 可清空的单选模式下用户点击清空按钮时触发

events.name: blur
events.description_zh: 当 input 失去焦点时触发

events.name: focus
events.description_zh: 当 input 获得焦点时触发

slots.name: empty
slots.description: A list when there are no options
